mapinfo.detailsText:
In this region of the Northwest Territories, you will find yourself surrounded by shallow marshes and winding cliffs. Each team begins on a high plateau with limited resources, surrounding a lush lowland filled with resources. Control the trade routes and the central portion of the map to ensure victory. 
 
 
 Outlaws: Comanchero / Renegado 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Observer UI by Aizamk 
 


 Map by dansil92
